title: Doctors portal
description: I'm thrilled to present my project, a Doctors Portal website developed from scratch using React.js and Node.js. This platform empowers users to seamlessly book appointments with specific doctors at their preferred times and offers a comprehensive view of all appointments.

topics.topicDetails: Users can effortlessly schedule appointments with various types of doctors based on their specialization and availability.
The platform allows users to select specific dates and times that suit their schedules, making it easy to find a convenient slot.
The website categorizes doctors by their specialties, ensuring users can find the right healthcare professional for their needs.
Users have access to a user-friendly dashboard displaying all their appointments in one place, simplifying the management of their medical schedule.
Doctors can update their availability in real-time, ensuring users have the most accurate appointment options.
Permit users to register, safely log in, and update their personal information on their profiles.
Enable physicians to update their availability, manage their schedules, and set aside time for pauses or other obligations.

title: e-commerce
description: a node.js and react-built e-commerce platform that offers customers a seamless purchasing experience. Features include secure checkout with PayPal integration and SSL, product browsing, cart management, order history tracking in customer profiles, and user registration and login. Guests can shop without any hassles. Moreover, REST APIs can be used to retrieve product lists and details.

topics.topicDetails: User registration and login for personalized shopping experiences. Guest users can explore and shop without signing in.
Browse an extensive product catalog with detailed descriptions and images. Fetch product lists and details through APIs.
Add items to the cart and manage quantities. Easily review and modify your cart's contents.
Integration with SSL for secure and trusted payment processing.
Completed orders are automatically logged in the user's profile. Easily track past orders and reorder favorite items.
Utilize RESTful APIs to retrieve product lists and details programmatically.

title: Food Market
description: I'm thrilled to present my project, a React.js-built food market website where customers can browse a huge selection of mouthwatering options, add items to their carts, and place orders with a simple payment process. Strong search and filtering tools have been implemented, enabling users to locate the precise meal they're looking for with ease.

topics.topicDetails: For safe and practical online transactions, integrate the Stripe payment gateway.
To make food management and order monitoring tools easily accessible, create a separate admin dashboard.
To make sure that only authorised administrators may access and manage food items, implement secure authentication and authorization mechanisms.
Implemented powerful search and filter features, allowing users to quickly find the exact meal they desire.
Users can easily select their favorite items and add them to their cart for a smooth and convenient shopping experience.
This system keeps a comprehensive order history, making it simple for users to reorder their favorite dishes.
The website is designed to provide an excellent user experience across various devices, from desktop to mobile.

title: Hostel Meal Management
description: I'm excited to present my project, a hostel meal management website made to make mealtimes in residence halls easier for students. This platform, which was built from the ground up with React.js and Node.js, provides a seamless overview of meal consumption, department-specific features, and a detailed meal history.

topics.topicDetails: Organised data by dividing the hostel into discrete halls, and then further categorising each hall into a department.
Give each student a portal to view personal data unique to their department and residence hall.
Provide an admin panel that allows administrators to manage user roles administratively.
Use secure login systems with separate user roles (administration, food manager, and student) to safeguard user privacy.
Students can access their complete meal history, tracking how many meals they've used, the cost per meal, and any remaining or due amounts.
The website is structured to cater to different university departments, ensuring each one has a customized experience in managing meals and payments.
Implemented robust security measures to protect user data and ensure data privacy.
